Module oregon_trail
Package oregon_trail

Class randomEvents

java.lang.Object
oregon_trail.randomEvents
public class randomEvents extends Object
Author:
Anthony The randomEvents class is responsible for generating any events that randomly happen, and uses main to actually interact with other classes in the program

  • Method Details

    • oxenDeath

      public boolean oxenDeath(int pace, int distanceTraveled)
      Method to kill oxen
      Parameters:
      pace - Passed from Map, responsible for chance calculation
      distanceTraveled - Passed from Map, responsible for chance calculation
      Returns:
      boolean if an oxen is killed or not

    • partLoss

      public boolean partLoss(int pace, int distanceTraveled, int temperature)
      Method to initiate the wagon part loss/destruction
      Parameters:
      pace - Passed from Map, responsible for chance calculation
      distanceTraveled - Passed from Map, responsible for chance calculation
      temperature - Passed from Map, responsible for chance calculation. Uses modulo to avoid any errors in division
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean if a part is lost or not

    • wrongTrail

      public boolean wrongTrail()
      Method to initiate the wrong trail event
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean if the wrong trail is taken. Totally random chance every time this is called.
